transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Hello. Yes.
Customer: Hello, good evening, ma'am.
Executive: Yeah, good evening.
Executive: Hello. Ma'am, Shadab bol raha hu IndiaMART se account manager. Meri baat Birgo Aluminium Limited mein ho rahi hai na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ma'am, abhi aapne ek concern raise kiya tha video meet ke regarding pe.
Customer: Ek minute hold rakhoge sir, jinhone kiya tha main unhi se baat karwa deti hu aapki.
Executive: Okay, okay.
Customer: Just a bit.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good evening, sir. Haanji.
Executive: Sir, Shadab bol raha hu sir IndiaMART se account manager. Baat kar nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Haanji, haanji. Theek hai sir.
Executive: Ji, badhiya sir. Sir, abhi mere paas ek concern aaya tha aapka video meet ke liye sir ne bola hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Toh sir matlab kya?
Customer: Sir, abhi maine connect. Ji sir.
Customer: Yaar, ek na jo leads aa rahi hai na. Ji. Mere ko ye tha ki ek baar aap apna profile ko review karo. Ji, ji. Leads proper nahi aa rahi hai. Aluminium coils hum likh rahe hai, wo kuch aur hi beech mein cheeze aa rahi hai. Toh ek toh ye concern tha, wo leads proper match nahi ho rahi hai hamari profile ke saath. Usko dekho aur kaise optimize kar sakte hai.
Executive: Sir, uske toh koi nahi sir, aap samne aayenge na video call pe toh hum dekh lenge ki main bata dunga ki wo lead jo aa rahi hai wo hamari kis kis product wajah se aa rahi hai. Jaise irrelevancy aa rahi hai. Jo hamara product hai nahi, dusra product ki valid aa rahi hai. Toh waha pe sir aisi koi category hogi jo yaha pe add hogi hamare product mein.
Customer: Aapke paas mera account hai na?
Executive: Ji, ji. Details hai. Ek baar aap zara check karo. Isme jo agar hum. Ji haan, present time pe agar main valid ki baat karu toh aluminium roofing sheet hai.
Customer: Chalo, main abhi isme likh raha hu aluminium roofing sheet. Ji.
Executive: Dusri valid bhi aluminium roofing sheet hai, teesri metal roofing sheet hai. 25 square feet ki hai. Sir, ye metal roofing aluminium. Ji.
Executive: Jindal roofing sheets. Aluminium roofing sheets. Sir, present time pe agar main dekhu toh hamare paas sir sheets ki zyada valid aa rahi hai na?
Customer: Haan yaar, ye sheets ki aa rahi hai, koi double layer ye na hum deal nahi karte. Jaise main aapko batata hu, hamara hai coils. Main ye keh raha hu agar kahi pe profile aapki optimize honi hai toh usko optimize kar do. Ab ye jaise hai mera aluminium coils likha hai maine. Isme kya aa raha hai ye? Double fold aluminium channel letter rules. Ye kuch aur hi cheez aa gayi. Aluminium driver car AC cooling coil. Maine aluminium wo likha hai ye koi car AC cooling coil. Car AC cooling coil. Aluminium coils ka toh kuch aa hi nahi raha.
Executive: Aluminium coil sir aapko aisa matlab aisa jo koi business hai jo matlab ki aapka koi competitor hai nahi koi jante hai aap? Jo same product mein deal karte hai. Ye dekho aluminized steel for bakery. Ye cheeze aa rahi hai iske andar.
Customer: Jaise koi competitor hai. Main ye cheez keh raha hu, ye cheez aap ek baar profile ko thoda sa optimize kar lo. Ji. Ek kaam karte hai, main sir aapko ek link share kar raha hu. Register mail ID pe apni screen share karunga. Senior ko bhi le leta hu apne saath mein video call mein. Sir, waha pe aap concern bata dijiyega. Jo bhi correction hoga hum wahi pe kar lenge. Ye jo mails hai ye. Sir, thoda liya tha ek baar aap nahi dekh sakte ye cheeze?
Customer: Main ye keh raha tha ek baar aap apne end se study kar lo hamare kya kya products hai. Haanji. Main ye keh raha tha ek baar hamare jo bhi products hai aap ek baar profile ko apne hisab se dekho ki optimize hai ya nahi hai, kaha kaha pe dikkat aa rahi hai. Usko ek baar theek kar lo. Hum na ek baar bhai kal meeting karte hai. Kal Guru Nanak Jayanti hai na sir. Achcha. Kal chutti hai. Ji. Kal chutti hai. Chalo abhi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads not matching profile; aluminium coils issue.

- Wants profile review and optimization.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video call for issue resolution.

- Executive will share a link for a video call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share a link for video call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profile optimization, video call, aluminium coils
